Title: Requires motor vehicle repair shops to disclose certain information to customers
Summary: Requires motor vehicle repair shops to disclose whether parts supplied are under warranty and the estimate for all parts and labor; provides that no work can be done without the consent of the customer; provides for fines for violations of such provisions.
LawCode: Amd ยง398-d, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring motor vehicle repair shops to disclose certain information to customers
